sub_topic: Calculating the bond dissociation energy of a molecule
message_1: What is the bond dissociation energy (in kJ/mol) of HBr molecule if it requires 364.4 kJ of energy to break one mole of HBr bonds?
message_2: The bond dissociation energy of HBr molecule is 364.4 kJ/mol. This is because it takes 364.4 kJ of energy to break one mole of HBr bonds.
